jobTitle: Senior Data Analyst - Product and User Insights
jobDescription: Senior Data Analyst - Product and User Insights  Product Austin, Texas Are you a data rock star? Do you love data, working with data, finding the nuance that leads to key differentiation for the business and our customers? Do you want to help enable a data-driven organization? This is your opportunity to be a key member of our AffiniPay Product Team which is just beginning to harness the power of data. This role interfaces across the team to answer challenging analytical questions and highlight insights to customers such as revenue generation ideas, opportunities and observations that focus on behaviors. Youll be key to the creation of a visualization dashboard that will be the crucial to enabling better decision making. Your day to day responsibilities:
